## DatabaseCloseOption type

How to close database

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type DatabaseCloseOption = {
    force?: boolean;
    timeout?: number;
};
```

## Remarks

- force: Clear queued operations immediately.

- timeout: Clear queued operation after timeout(msec). Default is 10000.
